amendment.description: Page 337, after line 18, insert the following: SEC. XXX. REFINANCING OF CERTAIN RURAL HOSPITAL DEBT. Subtitle D of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act (7 U.S.C. 1981 et seq.) is amended by inserting after section 341 the following: ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to modify the Community Facilities Direct Loan and Guarantee Loan Program and the Business and Industry Guaranteed Loan Program to permit rural hospitals to refinance existing debt.
